TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentPaginatorSource

Docs.summary: Defines the source object that performs actual content pagination.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentPaginator As DocumentPaginator

Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, gets the object that performs content pagination.
Docs.value: The object that performs the actual content pagination.
